decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Location Plan A4; P1 Rev P1 (Location Plan A3); P2 Rev 2 (Existing and Proposed Site Plan); P3 Rev 2 (Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plan); P4 Rev 2 (Existing and Proposed First Floor Plan); P5 Rev 2 (Existing and Proposed Loft Plan); P6 Rev 2 (Existing and Proposed Roof Plan); P7 Rev 2 (Existing and Proposed Front Elevations); P9 Rev 2 (Existing and Proposed Rear Elevation); P10 Rev 2 (Existing and Proposed Side Elevation 1); P11 Rev 2 (Existing and Proposed Side Elevation 2).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
